Literature.Title: Characterization, mechanism of action and optimization of activity of a novel peptide-peptoid hybrid against bacterial pathogens involved in canine skin infections.
Literature.Author: Greco I, Emborg AP, Jana B, Molchanova N, Oddo A, Damborg P, Guardabassi L, Hansen PR

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=230 µM,Human erythrocytes:32% Hemolysis=150 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus pseudintermedius C22963(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 26314(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=64µg/ml),Corynebacterium auriscanis(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pasteurella canis(MIC=8µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis(MIC=>64µg/ml),Streptococcus canis(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8µg/ml)
